description.en: A new monstergirl series running in Comic Ryu that follows Hitomi, a cyclops that works as a nurse at a school, and the many students that come to her for help with their human (and not-so-human) problems.

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

My little sister Umaru (age 16) is a renowned beautiful girl in the town. A perfect sister with a kind heart, high scores and popularity, that everybody admires…  
  
Or at least that's what people believe, but once she walks in her room, she becomes…
description.pt-br:
Minha irmã Umaru (16 anos) é uma linda e renomada garota da cidade. Uma irmã perfeita com um coração bondoso, pontuações altas e popularidade, que todos admiram…

Ou pelo menos é o que as pessoas acreditam, mas uma vez que ela entra em seu quarto, ela se torna...

description.en:
In the distant future, earth is covered by thick clouds and deprived of the warm rays of sunlight. Natural plants have all but withered, leading to low levels of oxygen everywhere. 

However, humans have developed a technique to transform people into plants to produce a small amount of oxygen that allows mankind to keep surviving. In this world, everyone must decide: Will they live as humans in a bleak and uncertain world, or abandon their anguish to embrace a new life as plants?
description.ru:
Продолжать прикладывать усилия ради жизни человеком? Или же красиво осыпаться, подобно цветку? Душевно изображенный неизвестный мир будущего!

Мир далёкого будущего окружают облака, не пропускающие дневной свет, увядших растений и недостатка кислорода. Однако, люди разработали технологию превращения человека в растение для получения кислорода и продолжают выживать.
Перед людьми встаёт нелёгкий выбор - продолжать выживать в этом безнадежном мире людей или же, отбросив страдания, сделать шаг в новую жизнь в виде растений?

description.en: Kurosaki Sou is a 16 year old who summons a devil to take his virginity. He hopes for a devil with flaming red hair, large horns, and black wings. He gets exactly what he wishes for, although he forgets something else rather important. Now he’s forced to live with this devil and has to think of a way to get rid of it, and most importantly – survive its lust
description.pt: Kurosaki Sou é um garoto de 16 anos, que invoca um demônio para tirar sua virgindade. Ele espera por um demônio com cabelo vermelho flamejante, grandes chifres e asas negras. Ele não recebe exatamente o que deseja já que na invocação esqueceu de algo muito importante. Agora, ele é forçado a viver com esse demônio e tem que pensar em uma maneira de se livrar dele, e mais importante - sobreviver aos desejos e artimanhas desse demônio ….

altTitles.en: Baki Hanma - Son of Ogre (Shinsoban Release)

description.en:
The climax of the Baki series, "Hanma Baki", newly re-edited!

Hanma Yuujirou, the world's strongest creature, vs. Hanma Baki, the world's strongest high schooler... A spat between father and son on an unprecedented scale begins here!

title.en: The Idaten Deities Know Only Peace

altTitles.en: Idaten Deities In The Peaceful Generation

description.en:
Hayato is a young deity with a foul mouth who has always heard legends about Demons that were sealed away about 800 years ago. Follow the epic saga of several young deities, who end up having to fight demons, humans and overcome several challanges.  
  
  
A remake of a web manga of the same name with new art by Cool-Kyou Shinja.

description.az: İncəsənətə həvəsi olan adi oğlan Junichi Naruse yenidən eskiz və rəsm çəkməyə qərar verir. Bunu etdikdən sonra o, Mequmi Hamura ilə tanış olur və ona aşiq olur. Onlar görüşməyə başladıqdan və nəhayət birlikdə yaşamaq qərarına gəldikdən sonra Junichi daşınmaz əmlak ofisinə baş çəkir. Lakin daşınmaz əmlak ofisində baş verən oğurluq zamanı bir uşağı xilas etməyə çalışarkən başından güllə yarası alır. Hadisədən bir ay sonra özünə gələn Junichi-nin möcüzəvi şəkildə sağalması naməlum donordan beyin transplantasiyası alması ilə mümkün olur. Zaman keçdikcə Junichi şəxsiyyətində kəskin dəyişikliklərin fərqinə varır, ağıl vəziyyətini qorumaq üçün mübarizə apararkən mövcud münasibətlərinə pis təsir göstərir. Tədricən dəlilik səviyyəsinə yaxınlaşan Junichi öz şəxsiyyətini həmişəlik itirməzdən əvvəl donorun kim olduğunu müəyyənləşdirib bunun səbəbini anlamaq istəyir.
description.en:
The main protagonist, the shy Jun Naruse, is a rather average guy who works for a electronic company and loves to draw. He falls in love with Megumi whom he met at a shop selling drawing materials and an intimate relationship develops. One year later the office gets attacked and when the criminal tries to shoot a little girl he saves her by jumping in front of her.  
  
A month passes until he wakes up again and is told that half his brain got destroyed and he only survived because someone donated half a brain. Everything seems to be fine, he quickly recovers and is happy, however he begins to change… is the donated brain the reason for that? Or is it just a side effect of the medicine?
A primitive tribe on an island. During a tempest, a young girl disappears. Ten years later, she mysteriously reappears. The contact with civilization seems to have changed her.

Fall from a building, fall in love.  
Shinji was a high school guy without a future.  
He went up to the roof of a building with plans to jump, only to run into his beautiful teacher, Shinanoya-sensei!  
Then she made a shocking proposal that would change Shinji's destiny…  
An exuberant tale of double suicide from the pen of a genius!!

The story takes place in Okinawa, where Haruka forms a beach volleyball pair with Kanata. Kanata, who couldn't handle the pressure put on her by her short height, had given up on beach volleyball already, but is convinced by Haruka to step back on the sand once again and aim for the junior tournament.

description.ar: أوكازاكي ماكوتو تلميذ في الثانوية، هدف سهل للمتنمرين، يقرر في أحد الليالي إرجاع شريط الفيديو للمتجر، فيلمح على أحد السطوح شخصاُ ما وقبل أن يلاحظ حتى، قفز ذلك الشخص من أعلى المبنى عليه و أخذ في مص دمه...، من ذلك الشخص؟!! ما الذي سيحدث لماكوتو...؟ .
description.en: Makoto Okazaki is your run of the mill high-schooler, a perfect bullying target and a closet pervert. One night he decides to return a DVD to a friend of his and ventures out into the darkness. He notices a person on a nearby rooftop. The person lunges at him before he is able to make sense of this, and bites into his neck, drinking his blood. The attacker stops. At this point Makoto notices that the attacker is a beautiful girl. She asks him: "Do you want to die or become like me?" He decides to live…
description.fa:
ماکوتو چیزی را در تاریکی روی پشت بام خانه‌ای دید. دختری زیبا روی به سمتش هجوم برد و نیشش را در گلویش فرو کرد و خونش را نوشید. سپس دختر زیبا روی سرش را نزدیک صورت ماکوتو برد و پرسید:« میخوای بمیری یا… میخوای مثل من باشی؟»   
جوابی که ماکوتو داد زندگی‌ش را برای همیشه تغییر داد.
description.es-la: Makoto Okazaki es el típico chico tonto, el objetivo perfecto de los bravucones; además de ser el clásico pervertido. Una noche, camino a casa de un amigo para regresar un DVD, divisa una persona en el techo de una casa. Esta persona lo embiste y muerde su cuello, succionando así su sangre. Y entonces la atacante, una hermosa chica, le pregunta: «¿Quieres morir así o… prefieres ser como yo?» Y Makoto elige la opción que le permitirá seguir con vida…

altTitles.th: ร้อยเรียงรักจากหัวใจ

description.de: Als die gehörlose Studentin Yuki eines Tages in Schwierigkeiten gerät, kommt ihr ihr Kommilitone Itsuomi zu Hilfe. Yuki ist fasziniert von Itsuomi, da er sie trotz ihres Handicaps wie einen ganz normalen Menschen behandelt. Durch ihn beginnt Yuki nicht nur eine neue Welt zu entdecken, sondern bekommt auch zum ersten Mal Herzklopfen.
description.en:
One day, Yuki, a university student, is in trouble when she is rescued by Itsuomi, a senior student at the same university. Even though Yuki is deaf due to a hearing impairment, Itsuomi is unfazed and treats her naturally. Yuki gradually becomes aware of Itsuomi, who makes her feel a new world...

---
Yuki is a typical college student, whose world revolves around her friends, social media, and the latest sales. But when a chance encounter on a train leads to her meeting friend-of-a-friend and fellow student Itsuomi-san, her world starts to widen. But even though Itsuomi-kun can speak three languages, sign language isn't one of them. Can the two learn to communicate the budding feelings between them?
description.es: La vida de Yuki, una universitaria con sordera, va a dar un vuelco cuando en su camino se cruce el joven Itsuomi, un muchacho que, a pesar de dominar varios idiomas, no conoce la lengua de signos japonesa. Itsuomi se interesa enseguida en Yuki y desea aprender la lengua de signos y, sobre todo, entrar en el mundo de ella. Signos de afecto es una historia de amor sobre la necesidad de la comunicación, sobre el aprendizaje de las diferencias y sobre la empatía.
description.fr:
Yuki est une étudiante qui, comme beaucoup d'autres, construit son quotidien autour de ses amis, des réseaux sociaux et de ce qu'elle aime. Mais quand un jour, dans le train, elle croise un jeune homme qui voyage à travers le monde, son univers va être chamboulé: ce dernier, bien que trilingue, ne connaît pas la langue des signes. Pourtant, très vite, il manifestera pour elle un intérêt bien particulier… Comment réagira-t-elle face à ce camarade d'université entreprenant et communicatif?

A sign of affection décrit avec pudeur et simplicité l'histoire d'amour entre une jeune femme sourde et un grand voyageur. à n'en pas douter, les personnages de ce manga ne manqueront pas de vous émouvoir!
description.it: Un giorno, in un momento di difficoltà, una studentessa universitaria di nome Yuki viene aiutata da Itsuomi, un senpai che frequenta il suo stesso istituto. Il giovane la tratta con grande naturalezza e non si scompone minimamente quando capisce che la ragazza è sorda. Ben presto, Yuki scoprirà di provare qualcosa per quel ragazzo, grazie al quale ha cominciato a percepire la realtà in maniera del tutto nuova...
description.ja: 女子大生の雪は、ある日困っているところを同じ大学の先輩・逸臣に助けてもらう。聴覚障がいがあって耳が聴こえない雪にも動じることなく、自然に接してくれる逸臣。自分に新しい世界を感じさせてくれる逸臣のことを雪は次第に意識し始めて…！？
description.ko: 여대생 유키는 어느날 곤란에 처해있을 때 같은 대학 선배인 이츠오미의 도움을 받는다. 청각장애가 있어 귀가 들리지 않는 유키에게도 동요하지 않고 자연스럽게 대해주는 이츠오미. 자신에게 새로운 세계를 느끼게 해준 이츠오미를 유키는 점점 의식하기 시작하는데…?!
description.pt: Yuki é uma típica estudante universitária que nasceu surda. Ela ama estar perto dos seus amigos, redes sociais e fazer compras. Certo dia, ela recebe ajuda de Itsuomi, um estudante da mesma universidade que ela, enquanto estava no metrô. A partir daí, nasce uma amizade entre eles que se torna cada vez mais especial. "Neste dia, Yuki sentiu o seu mundo mudar."
description.ru: Это нежная история о любви между глухонемой девушкой и парнем, говорящем на нескольких языках и облетевшем мир, как много они могут привнести и изменить в мирах друг друга? Ицуоми выручает Юки, оказывается, что они учатся в одном университете. Случайная встреча, заинтересованность, стремление, желание… Что же Юки постепенно осознает?..
description.th: วันหนึ่ง ขณะกำลังตกที่นั่งลำบาก ยูคิ นักศึกษาสาว ได้อิสึโอมิ รุ่นพี่นักศึกษามหา'ลัยเดียวกันช่วยไว้แม้ยูคิจะไม่ได้ยินเสียงเพราะมีความบกพร่องทางการได้ยินแต่อิสึมิก็ยังทำตัวปกติเป็นธรรมชาติกับเธออย่างใจเย็นจากนั้นยูคิก็เริ่มสนใจอิสึมิที่ช่วยตัวเองได้สัมผัสถึงโลกใบใหม่ขึ้นมา...!?
description.tr: Tüm dünyası arkadaşları, sosyal medyası ve çok satanları etrafında dönen Yuki, tipik bir üniversite öğrencisidir. Ancak bir trende, bir arkadaşının arkadaşı olan İtsuomi-san ile tanışma şansı olunca dünyası genişlemeye başlar. Fakat maalesef, her ne kadar İtsuomi-kun üç dil konuşabilse de, işaret dili onlardan biri değildir. İkisi, aralarındaki tomurcuklanan duyguları birbirine iletmeyi öğrenebilecek mi?
description.uk:
Юкі — студентка. Як і в багатьох інших ровесників, її повсякденне життя обертається навколо друзів, соцмереж, загалом усього, що їй подобається. Та якось вона випадково зустріла в потязі юнака, що любить подорожувати, і її світ перевернувся.

Іцуомі трилінгв, однак не знає японської мови жестів.

Проте незабаром він нею особливо зацікавиться… Як Юкі відреагує на цього впертого однокурсника, який прагне подружитися з нею? «A Sign of affection» лаконічно і просто описує історію кохання дівчини з порушенням слуху та завзятого мандрівника. Без сумніву, стосунки між героями цієї манґи неодмінно вас зворушать!
description.zh: 自從與你相遇之后，我的世界出現了改變的聲音。
description.pt-br:
Yuki é uma típica estudante universitária que nasceu surda, cujo mundo gira em torno de seus amigos, redes sociais e as últimas vendas. Mas quando um encontro casual em um trem a leva a conhecer o amigo de um amigo e colega estudante Itsuomi-san, seu mundo começa a se ampliar. Mas mesmo que Itsuomi-kun fale três línguas, a linguagem de sinais não é uma delas.  

Os dois podem aprender a comunicar os sentimentos que estão surgindo entre eles?

description.en:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
description.fr:
En 1998, suite à la multiplication de surhumains appelés “choujin“, le monde a été divisé en provinces autonomes. Cinquante ans après, un crash aérien va changer à tout jamais le destin de la jeune Ely, cultivatrice de “tomeïto“, et impacter le paisible quotidien des lycéens Tokio Kurohara et Azuma Higashi, qui jouent aux justiciers face aux petits malfrats de quartier…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Glénat**
description.hu:
Amikor egy repülőgép lezuhan miközben egy különös, fekete füstöt ereget, a két jó barát Tokio és Azuma úgy dönt, hogy csatlakozik az önkéntes kutató és mentőcsapathoz. Azonban egy csomó roncs helyett azt látják, hogy a repülő minimális károkat szenvedett valamint több mint 200 utas túlélte a balesetet. De mivel nem volt szükség már rájuk így elindulnak hazafelé. Viszont az úton szembejön velük egy régi ellenségük, aki valami bizar erő birtokosa lett, és elakarja pusztítani őket. Tokio és Azuma egyetlen esélye a túlélésre az, hogy szupererővel rendelkező lényekké - Úgy nevezett Choujin-okká válnak.

De a szupererő nem megoldás mindenre. Tokio-nak titokban kell tartania az erejét a családja, és iskolája elől, miközben egyre több különös esemény történik városszerte.
description.ru:
Азума Хигаши довольно популярный парень. И хотя он не очень крупный, но обладает хорошими боевыми навыками и сильным чувством справедливости. Также он имеет высочайшие оценки в своём классе. Прямая противоположность Азуме его друг Токио Курохара, который не слишком увлечён учёбой. Даже во время драк он выступает как простой наблюдатель. Тем не менее, невзирая на сложности и различия, эти два закадычных приятеля держатся друг друга.
Оба парня живут в префектуре Ямато – самом обычном регионе страны, который более всего известен тем, что некоторые его области были уничтожены Сверхчеловеком.
description.uk:
Азума Хіґаші доволі популярний хлопець: низенький красень із гарними бойовими навичками, має підвищене почуття справедливості, найкращі оцінки у класі та друга… свою повну протилежність - Токіо Курохару, боязкого хлопчака, який лиш спостерігає за бійками Азуми та ловить ґав на уроках. І все ж, не зважаючи на це, міці їхньої дружби можна позаздрити.

Префектура Ямато, район, де вони живуть, наполовину зруйнований Надлюдьми - особами із небезпечними надприродними здібностями. Часто саме вони влаштовують погроми чи сутички, в центрі яких цього разу й опинился хлопці. Перед загрозою смерті друзі приймають рішення стати Надлюдьми. Зміни торкаються Токіо, який вже не може бути стороннім спостерігачем, він потрапляє у пастку світу, де битва неминуча.
description.vi: Một tác phẩm mới được khắc họa dưới ngòi bút của tác giả bộ manga đình đám tokyo ghoul. "Siêu nhân X" kể về thế giới có những nhân vật đặc biệt được gọi là "Siêu nhân"[Choujin], nhân vật chính là Tokio Kurobara, một học sinh trung học ở tỉnh Yamato, hiện tại cậu ấy cùng người bạn Higashi Azuma thực thi công lý.Và rồi một ngày nọ, khi cả hai rơi vào tình thế hiểm nghèo bắt buộc chỉ còn cách dùng một ống tiêm kỳ lạ...
description.es-la: Azuma Higashi es un chico bastante popular. Aunque puede ser algo pequeño, tiene fuertes habilidades de lucha y sus calificaciones son las mejores de su clase. Esto es lo opuesto a Tokio Kurohara, su amigo que no escucha en clase y es simplemente un espectador mientras Azuma pelea. No obstante, el vínculo de estos dos amigos de la infancia es fuerte, sin importar cuán diferentes sean. Los dos viven en la prefectura de Yamato, un distrito increíblemente ordinario con algunas áreas destruidas por Choujin. Los choujin son humanos con poderes sobrenaturales y peligrosos, a menudo la causa de la destrucción circundante. Mientras regresaban a casa, Tokio y Azuma se encuentran con un Choujin, que amenaza con matarlos. Sin posibilidad de escapar, Tokio y Azuma toman una decisión crucial: convertirse en Choujin. Con estos nuevos poderes adquiridos, Tokio ya no puede ser el espectador que alguna vez fue, ahora atrapado en un mundo donde la lucha es inevitable.

description.en: This is what you'd get if K-ON was not about cute girls doing cute things in a light music club, but cute girls doing cute things in an FPS game club.

altTitles.ja: GTO パラダイス・ロスト

description.en: Onizuka is a prisoner. For reasons that he only knows, he tells the story himself of what happened between him and Class G (which is basically an idol class), expect many troubles, adventures and of course many hilarious moments.

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について

altTitles.en: The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

description.en:
Plants have taken over the planet.  
  
In 2017, the vegetation in Tokyo rose up and toppled human society in moments.  
The few survivors are forced to live in the relative safety of a subway network, but supplies are running low.  
Join an average high school student named Akira as he challenges the plants in a struggle for survival!

Following the spirit of the origins of our popular big-breasted girls of Himura Kiseki-sensei, presenting a special Blue Edition of the weekly chapters of Yanmaga magazine's serialization "Getsuyoubi no Tawawa"!

---

Be sure to check out the published volumes released in Blue format in the Retail section, and the official English licensing by Denpa US (also in Blue)!

A salary man is quite depressed, especially on Mondays. At his lowest point a well-endowed High-School girl calling herself Ai-chan stumbles breast-first into his face. The concussion she gave him served as the start of their relationship.  
  
**Notes**:
 - This page refers to the Twitter manga's official serialization, which began in Weekly Young Magazine on November 16, 2020.
 - For the separate Blue Edition for the serialization, click [here](https://mangadex.org/title/f5818aee-080b-42b5-b717-b1dae81f049c/getsuyoubi-no-tawawa-blue)
description.fr: Un employé de bureau est déprimé, surtout les lundis. Au bout du rouleau, une lycéenne bien fournie qui se fait appeler Ai-chan lui tombe dessus, poitrine la première. La blessure qu’elle lui a infligée, marque le début de leur relation.
description.ja: 読めばアナタも元気になれる！ 月曜日の憂鬱なんて吹っ飛ばす！ たわわな女の子たちの日常コメディ！
description.pt-br:
Um assalariado fica bastante deprimido, principalmente às segundas-feiras. Em seu ponto mais baixo, uma garota bem dotada do colégio que se autodenomina Ai-chan tropeça no rosto dele. A concussão que ela deu a ele serviu como o início de seu relacionamento. 

*Esta página refere-se à serialização oficial do mangá do Twitter, que começou na Weekly Young Magazine em 16 de novembro de 2020.*

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.en: It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

description.en: A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

altTitles.ja: 豪デレ美少女凪原そら

altTitles.zh-hk: 豪娇美少女 凪原空

altTitles.ja: ごうでれびしょうじょなぎはらそら

description.en:
Shouta's an otaku who's only love in the world is manga. One day, he happens to wish for one of his favorite character, Nagihara Sora, to be by his side…and so she does! But what is he to do when he finds that his gentle and weak Sora has turned out to be a violent gou-dere (an unstoppable force that does whatever she pleases for her master, out of her love for her master) who views the world as a ero-game to be conquered for his sake?

Note: the order of some chapters has been altered to match the volume release.

title.en: Gorin no Megami-sama: Nadeshiko Ryou no Medal Gohan

altTitles.ja: 五輪の女神さま 〜なでしこ寮のメダルごはん〜

altTitles.ru: Богиня Олимпийских игр: Медаль общежития Надесико Райс

description.en: The main character, Kominato Ryo, who is only engaged in cooking, was allowed to enter the prestigious Cho Gakuen Private School on the condition that he work as a cook in a student dormitory under the supervision of his father. However, the “dormitory” was the women's dormitory where future gold medal candidates lived. The nutritional requirements of top athletes are naturally high. Fill their stomachs and take on the challenging mission of building your body for the Olympic Games!

altTitles.ja: グッド・ナイト・ワールド

description.en:
A story about four members of the same broken family who find peace in a game called "Planet." The catch is: they don't know about each other.  
  
As the story unfolds hidden things are discovered about each member and about the relation the virtual world has with reality and how they affect one another.

The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?  
  
This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.  

This comic is posted for free on the author's weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/3567976483>
description.pl: Najłatwiejszym sposobem zjednoczenia się różnorodnych jednostek, które tworzą społeczeństwo, jest znalezienie wspólnego wroga. Szkoła jest mini społeczeństwem, więc czy to samo nie powinno odbywać się w klasie? Ta konkretna klasa wybrała na wspólnego wroga Xu Shanga. Ale wkrótce jeden z najpopularniejszych uczniów w szkole staje się zaintrygowany specyficznym życiem Shanga.
description.pt-br: Ao e Xun são amigos desde a infância que mantêm um relacionamento secreto fora da escola, na mesma escola existe o aluno transferido Xiao Shang que esconde uma vida totalmente diferente através de sua natureza tranquila. Círculos Sociais significam aceitações e esses meninos buscam uma forma de como se encaixar nesse meio.

altTitles.tr: Seraph of the End: Kıyamet Meleği

altTitles.pl: Seraph of the End: Serafin Dni Ostatnich

altTitles.en: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign

description.en: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
description.ru:
В стремлении к запретным знаниям «человек разумный» опять напортачил — в 2012 году на волю вырвался смертельный вирус, начавший косить человечество. Умирали почему-то взрослые, и тут, откуда ни возьмись, явились вампиры и согнали оставшихся детей в свой подземный город, объявив, что отныне «людишки» будут жить под защитой клыкастых хозяев, расплачиваясь кровью. Резкий парень Юитиро пожил так 4 года и понял, что пора валить — вместе с названным братом Микой и всей «семьей Хьякуя», группой детей, выросшей в одном приюте. Конечно, вампиры легко догнали и перебили беглецов, ушел лишь один.   
Выйдя на поверхность, юный Хьякуя понял, что эпидемия кончилась, но мир изменился — кругом разруха, бродят демоны, а кровососы потихоньку расширяют территорию, предлагая жителям «крышу». Власть в Японии захватила семья Хиираги, сформировавшая Имперскую Демоническую армию, которая защищает людей и бьет вампиров зачарованным оружием. Свой путь Юитиро ясен — готовиться к службе, мстить за погибшую родню. Прямого и порывистого парня ждет немало сюрпризов и неожиданностей, но в таком поганом мире лучше надеяться на свой дар и свой меч, чем на волю судьбы и благосклонность правителей!

description.en:
Grade-school teacher Shinichi just can't get any respect. His wife treats him like a nuisance, his daughter ignores his every word, his coworkers think he's pitiful. His students regard him as a bore and an imbecile, and mercilessly bully his son, who wants nothing to do with him as a result. The only place Shinichi can find any confidence and self-esteem is alone in his room, where he's secretly sewn together a costume. It's a perfect replica of the suit worn by Zebraman, the hero of a third-rate 1970s superhero show that nobody remembers except Shinichi -- and much to his joy, the new, wheelchair-bound student at his school.
At the same time, strange things are occurring throughout the area. The citizens are nervous, and the military has dispatched agents to uncover - or perhaps cover up -- the source of the danger. Shinichi's urge to sneak out and prowl in his costume, to feel what a hero feels when guarding the night from evil, soon has him dragged into an increasingly bizarre mystery.
description.pt-br: O professor da escola primária Shinichi simplesmente não consegue nenhum respeito. Sua esposa o trata como um incômodo, sua filha ignora cada palavra sua, seus colegas de trabalho acham que ele é lamentável. Seus alunos o consideram um chato e um imbecil, e impiedosamente intimidam seu filho, que não quer nada com ele como resultado. O único lugar onde Shinichi pode encontrar alguma confiança e auto-estima é sozinho em seu quarto, onde ele secretamente costurou uma fantasia. É uma réplica perfeita do traje usado por Zebraman, o herói de um show de super-heróis de terceira categoria dos anos 1970 que ninguém se lembra, exceto Shinichi - e para sua alegria, o novo aluno em cadeira de rodas em sua escola. Ao mesmo tempo, coisas estranhas estão ocorrendo em toda a área. Os cidadãos estão nervosos e os militares enviaram agentes para descobrir - ou talvez encobrir - a fonte do perigo. O desejo de Shinichi de fugir e espreitar em seu traje, para sentir o que um herói sente ao proteger a noite do mal, logo o arrasta para um mistério cada vez mais bizarro.

description.en: Asagiri's second year at Mitsumine.

title.en: Majo Taisen - The War of Greedy Witches

altTitles.ja-ro: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

description.en: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches.” With the addition of the final witch, Joan of Arc, Walpurgis Night begins: Only one witch can survive, and have her wish granted!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

description.en:
In the world of Golem Hearts, creatures known as golems have become integrated with society, performing all sorts of tasks. These golems are created by the widely-respected "sorcery scholars," and obey the commands of their human masters without question. Noah is a sorcery scholar who strives to become the second best of his kind.  
  
To that end, he travels far and wide to study unique golems around the world. This journey leads him to a certain island, where he encounters a girl named Mary and her golem Murray. As the two get acquainted, we begin to discover that there may be more to Noah than meets the eye.  

---
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Golem Hearts were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.  
  
Prior to its serialization two "Golem Hearts"-oneshots were published, one of which can be found [here (RAW)](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/10833497643049550104).
description.fr: Dans le monde de Golem Hearts, des créatures connues sous le nom de golems se sont intégrées à la société, effectuant toutes sortes de tâches. Ces golems ont été créés par des "érudits en sorcellerie" très respectés et obéissent sans réserve aux ordres de leurs maîtres humains. Noah est un érudit en sorcellerie qui s'efforce de devenir le deuxième meilleur de son espèce. À cette fin, il parcourt de nombreuses régions pour étudier des golems uniques à travers le monde. Ce voyage le mène vers une certaine île, où il rencontre une fille nommée Mary et son golem Murray. Au fur et à mesure que les deux se familiarisent, nous commençons à découvrir qu'il peut y avoir plus à Noé que ce que l'œil ne voit.

description.en: A port town where the Mafia actively operates behind the scenes. Gohongi is a young man who has come back to this to place where he was born after many years and finds a job working at a video rental store, which also becomes his new home. It is here that he begins to live with a young girl named Mei and a homosexual by the name of Katsura. But both of them are members of the Mafia group, Lovely Town. And fifteen-year-old-Mei is a ruthless hitman. There have been rumors that the struggles between Mafia factions are becoming more intense. Still not able to completely grasp the situation, Gohongi winds up getting dragged into a world of trouble…

”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito ~Danzai sareta Tenseisha no Tame Usotsuki Heroine ni Fukushuu Itashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の中の人〜断罪された転生者のため嘘つきヒロインに復讐いたします〜

altTitles.zh: 恶役千金的真面目～为被定罪的转生者向骗子女主报复～

altTitles.zh-hk: 惡役千金的真面目～為被定罪的轉生者向騙子女主報復～

altTitles.ja: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito

altTitles.vi: Kẻ Cư Ngụ Bên Trong Ác Nữ

altTitles.fr: La fille au sein de l'antagoniste
Celle à l'intérieur de la vilaine

description.en:
In order to clear the name of 'Emi,' a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess' revenge to begin!
description.id:
Agar bisa membersihkan nama "Emi", yaitu nama seorang gadis yang bereinkarnasi menjadi Remilia sang villainess dari sebuah game otome, Remilia asli yang selama ini mengawasi emi dari dalam akhirnya telah tersadar.

Sekarang adalah waktunya bagi sang villainess yang asli untuk membalaskan dendamnya!

title.en: Gate - Teikoku no Bara Kishidan - Pinya Co Lada 14-sai

altTitles.en: Gate - Piña's Rose Order of Knights
Gate - Rose Knights of the Empire - 14 Year Old Pinya Co Lada

altTitles.ja-ro: Gate - Teikoku no Bara Kishidan - Pinya Co Lada 14-sai

altTitles.ja: ゲート 帝国の薔薇騎士団 ピニャ・コ・ラーダ14歳

altTitles.zh-hk: 門 帝國之薔薇騎士團 平娜‧戈‧蘭達14歲

description.en: A spin-off focusing on Princess Pinya's (from "Gate - Thus the JSDF Fought There!") life before the "Gate" opening to the other world event.
4-koma history.

Though Chichi the cat looks very cute, she has one goal: eradicate humanity and take over the world! She decides to recruit comrades to aid her in her quest, but it looks like world conquest won't be that easy?! 

Follow the adventures of Chichi the tyrant, Dunno the doggo who loves humans, and Kaiser Kang Taeshik, the hard-boiled wild hamster, as they face many hardships on their path to absolute dominion!
A group of high-school students had an accident on their way to a trip and died but they find themselves in a classroom with a black sphere.
description.ru: Возвращаясь с школьной поездки группа старшеклассников попала в аварию - никто не выжил. Но после они попадают в комнату с таинственным черным шаром…

altTitles.ja: 恋は双子で割り切れない

description.en: My family moved next door to the Jinguji family when I was six years old. From then until I was in the first grade of high school now, both parents were on good terms, and the twin sisters of the Jinguji family that I grew up with were my close friends as if they were like my own family. Ryumi, the sister who looks like a boy, and Naori, the otaku sister who is cute on the outside. And I'm Jun Shirasaki, who isn't afraid of being sandwiched between beautiful sisters with different personalities. Although I'm a novice in love, I don't have a special relationship and the changes continue. "Why don't you go out with me? How about we try dating?" These words from Ryumi eventually led us into a strange love triangle. The romantic comedy story of first love with twins begins!
description.id:
Keluargaku pindah ke sebelah keluarga Jinguji saat aku berusia enam tahun. Sejak saat itu sampai aku kelas satu SMA sekarang, kedua orang tua berhubungan baik, dan Saudari kembar keluarga jinguji yang tumbuh bersamaku merupakan teman dekatku seolah-olah mereka sudah seperti keluargaku sendiri.

Ryumi, saudari perempuan yang berpenampilan seperti laki-laki, dan Naori, saudari otaku yang memiliki sifat imut di luar. Dan Aku Jun Shirasaki, yang tidak takut terjepit di antara saudari perempuan cantik dengan kepribadian yang berbeda. Meskipun aku pemula dalma cinta, aku tak memiliki hubungan khusus dan perubahan terus berlanjut.

“Kenapa kau tidak pacaran denganku? Bagaimana kalau kita coba pacaran?”

Kata-Kata dari Ryumi ini akhirnya membawa kami ke cinta segitiga yang aneh.

Kisah komedi romantis cinta pertama dengan si kembar dimulai!

description.en: Yuu Haruna just moved into town and is addicted to twitter. When he goes out to buy dinner he bumps into a mysterious girl, Fuuka Akitsuki, who breaks his phone thinking he was trying to take a picture of her panties. How will his new life change now?
description.pt-br: O protagonista Yuu Haruna se muda para uma cidade e conhece uma garota estranha chamada Fuuka (cujo nome tem caracteres kanji para "vento" e "verão"). Esta menina, que é como um vento de verão possui um poder misterioso para atrair as pessoas.

description.en:
First story arc of the Jojo's Bizarre Adventure series.  
  
Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-1-phantom-blood/all)

altTitles.ja: フレームアームズ・ガール ラボ・デイズ

description.en:
Based on the hit model kit line by Kotobukiya, Frame Arms Girl.  
  
This manga follows Gourai, a newly activated Frame Arms Girl at Factory Advance as a test for self aware AI along side several other FA Girls.

title.en: There's a Demon Lord on the Floor

altTitles.fr: Il y a un Roi Démon dans le sous-sol

altTitles.en: There's a Demon Lord on the Floor

altTitles.ja: フロアに魔王がいます

description.en: Amon Patricia is a Demon Lord who ruled the land but after just barely escaping the Clan of Light finds her way to the Human World. Now there, she goes about searching for work and starts by looking at a family restaurant by the name of "Humming Dining" . With her seemingly bottomless appetite and love of our hero's food, will our hero be able to keep his sanity as he goes about making her an exemplary employee AND fill her stomach?!

At first glance - he's a weak guy. Arutsu is one prone to sickness and has always been. He literally fights bacteria and viruses in other people, with his friends. Our weak hero appears! Wait… maybe he's not so "weak" when he fights?!

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%83%80%E3%83%96%E3%83%AB%E3%82%B2%E3%83%BC%E3%82%B8)

"Neopulation". After the world discovered a way to transfuse organs of other living organisms onto human body, human life has changed dramatically. This is the story of a boy named “Shin” who left his hometown, Kingdom of Laguna, with a mysterious character named “Dorara”. The two travel across the world on a journey to search for the Dragon’s body parts.

altTitles.en: I Will Politely Decline the Male Lead!

altTitles.mn: Би эелдэгээр эрэгтэй гол дүрээс татгалзах болно!

altTitles.ja: 男主人公は丁重にお断りします！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我會禮貌地拒絕男主角

description.en:
A girl obsessed with a novel suddenly finds herself transported into the thick of the plot. The problem is, she has taken on the role of the villain in the story. And she knows how this ends… it's off with her head! Maybe she'll just let this play out and wake up back in reality… But after a few too many deaths to no avail, it's finally time to go off-script. She's going to have a little fun with this tale. She's made up her mind… to live!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.fr:
Condamnée à mourir le jour de ses 20 ans puis à ressusciter encore et toujours pour l'éternité, c'est là, sa malédiction. Mais quitte à voir son avenir ruiné, autant vivre comme on le souhaite! La méchante est bien décidée à suivre cet adage et a changé l'histoire du roman où elle se trouve. L'héroïne, sa rivale? Plus question! Elle est tellement adorable, plutôt en faire sa meilleure amie! Le fiancé? Un prince héritier cruel et idiot, mieux vaut l'éliminer du paysage. Cependant, à chacune de ses décisions s'éloignant de l'histoire originale, le futur se modifie. Jusqu'où va-t-elle bouleverser le cours du roman et tous ses personnages?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.ko:
비참하게 처형당하는 소설의 악역으로 빙의했다.
사망플래그를 피하기 위해 별짓 다 해봤지만, 돌아오는 건 결국 죽음뿐.
세 번째 회귀하던 날, 나는 결심했다.
막 살기로!

“이렇게 살아도 죽고, 저렇게 살아도 살해당하는 판에
나 하고 싶은 대로 하고 살겠다!”

그러나 원작에서 너무 멀어진 탓일까.
원래대로라면 원작 여주에게 향했어야 할 남주들의 관심이
어째서인지 나한테 향하는 것 같다……?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.uk:
Вона стала лиходійкою в романі, якій судилося жалісна смерть. У своєму першому житті вона пішла за оригінальною історією і померла. Потім знову прокинулась в тілі лиходійки. Під час наступної спроби вона робила все, щоб уникнути смерті, але врешті-решт її знову чекала лише вона.
Як би я не жила, все одно помру, чи не краще жити так, як хочеться?
Проте, щось я надто далеко відійшла від оригінального сюжету. Чому раптом головний герой зацікавився мною?...

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.zh-hk:
她在一部小說中被當作惡棍附身，在小說中被悲慘地處決。

我嘗試了一切來避免死亡標誌，但最終，只有死亡浮出水面。在第三次回歸的那天，我下定了決心。讓我們活下去吧！

"如果我這樣生活，我會死，如果我那樣生活，我會被殺！"

但這是因為它離原版太遠了嗎？主角對原版女主角的興趣似乎以某種方式針對了我......？

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)

description.en:
About a cat with a donut body in a post-apocalyptic world.  
  


---

A hilarious and touching story with a touch of horror, Donyatsu is about a cat with a doughnut body in a post-apocalyptic Tokyo, along with his food-based buddies, terrestrial enemies, shiritori-winning wreck of a robot/mecha, enigmatic food-based pig, and of course, the invading aliens…?   
  
If a manga that has sweet, sweet animals playing soccer with a human skull doesn't bother you, chances are you will crave Donyatsu.

Humanity's peaceful days all at once transform into an unspeakably odious hell. The sudden invasion of wasp-like insects, along with gargantuan "dolls" wielding their enormous alien weapons, annihilating everyone in their path. In the middle of the chaos, high school first-year, Iruma Ikaruga, fights to save his best friend and his beloved senpai from the dolls' assault with an unyielding spirit. However, all that awaits him is despair. Just what are the enormous puppets known as "Dolly"after? What fate awaits Iruma? The curtain has risen on humanity's "puppet show" of unimaginable despair, and the battle for survival has begun.
description.pt-br: Os dias calmos da humanidade se transformam em um odioso inferno. A repentina invasão de insetos parecidos com vespas, acompanhados de “bonecos” com gigantescas armas alienígenas, aniquilando todos em seu caminho. No meio do caos, um estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio, Iruma Ikaruga, luta para salvar seu melhor amigo e sua amada senpai do ataque dos “bonecos” com um espirito indomável. No entanto, tudo o que o espera é desespero. Mas o que são esses enormes bonecos conhecidos como "Dolly"? Qual será o destino Iruma? A cortina da da humanidade subiu no "show de marionetes" do desespero inimaginável, e a batalha pela sobrevivência já começou.

altTitles.ja: ダブルヘリクス ブロッサム

description.en: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.
